summary: P0 Features Testing Complete - All features verified: 360째 Account View Panel, Expandable Kanban Board, Enterprise DataTable with sorting/filtering/search. Backend: 15/15 tests passed. Frontend: All UI interactions working correctly.

360_account_view_api.details: API /api/accounts/{id}/360 returns complete account data with summary metrics, opportunities, invoices, activities, and contacts sections

360_account_view_panel.details: Slide-over panel opens from Accounts page via '360째 View' button. Shows account info, 4 summary cards (Pipeline Value, Won Revenue, Total Invoiced, Outstanding), and 4 collapsible sections (Opportunities, Invoices, Activities, Contacts)

360_collapsible_sections.details: All 4 collapsible sections (Opportunities, Invoices, Activities, Contacts) expand/collapse on click with proper animations

kanban_expand_button.details: Each Kanban column header has expand button (Maximize2 icon). Clicking expands that column to show deals in grid layout

kanban_column_minimize.details: When one column is expanded, other columns minimize to vertical bars showing stage name and count. Clicking minimized column expands it

kanban_collapse_all.details: 'Collapse' button appears when any column is expanded. Clicking returns all columns to normal width

datatable_sorting.details: Clicking sortable column headers (Opportunity, Value, Stage, Probability, Expected Close, Owner) sorts data ascending/descending with visual indicator

datatable_filters_button.details: 'Filters' button toggles filter row visibility. Filter row shows input fields for each filterable column

datatable_search.details: Search input filters table data in real-time. Shows '1 item (filtered from 9)' count when filtering

datatable_column_filters.details: Individual column filter inputs allow filtering by specific columns (Opportunity, Value, Stage, etc.)

critical_code_review_comments: All P0 features implemented correctly and working as expected
360째 Account View Panel has proper data-testid attributes for testing
Kanban expand/collapse feature provides excellent UX for focusing on specific pipeline stages
DataTable component is enterprise-grade with sorting, filtering, and search capabilities
API /api/accounts/{id}/360 properly aggregates data from data_lake_serving and legacy collections
seed_data_creation: None - used existing Odoo-synced data (5 accounts, 9 opportunities)
